articles.description: EXCLUSIVE: Brendan Gleeson is set to join Joaquin Phoenix and Lady Gaga in Todd Phillips’ Joker sequel, Joker: Folie à Deux for Warner Bros. and DC Films. Deadline recently broke the news that Zazie Beetz would be returning to reprise her role. Warner Bros. a…

articles.title: 9Things to do in Denver & Colorado this weekend: Sept. 1-5, 2022 - 9News.com KUSA
articles.description: Taste of Colorado is back in Denver, 3 college football games kick off the season and the first Oktoberfests of the season are here.
articles.content:
COLORADO, USA Happy Labor Day weekend! Although it may be the unofficial end to summer, there's still time to head outdoors and experience all that Colorado has to offer during the season.
